game.name: The Lost Planet Tower Defense
game.description:
This brave astronaut has mistakenly landed on a planet that is full of dangerous aliens who welcome the uninvited guests with a rude behaviour. When you enter the game, you see a horde of several savage creatures who are committed to defeat you at any cost. Do you think that you are capable enough to help him defend his ship? Join The Lost Planet: Tower Defense game and get ready to build the significant towers to protect his own base! Many grumpy foes and unknown obstacles are waiting you in this action-packed tower defense game. 
Your enemies are big in number and they will keep coming to you in different waves. React fast and try to place your towers wisely using your strategical mind! Different towers have unique features. Your quick and best decisions will only help you to defeat all your enemies by conquering areas of the lost planet. Do not forget to collect gems to fuel your weapons in this cool html5 adventure game! Keep discovering new things and protecting the exploration squad against the deadly monsters! 
There are various areas including Wasteland Area, Purple Mountain, Lava Area and more to explore in this one of the best free online war games for boys. Destroy all your enemies to clear all levels as fast as can and become a champion of a strategy game! People rely on your fighting skill, so do not let them feel down and fight hard to defend your spaceship from the group of invading alien species. Travel across the galaxy to spot unique and amazing lands in this mobile tower game! Collect batteries to buy new upgrades and unlock new places! Good luck to explore more defense games online for free on atmegame.com, with no install required!
